Key Match Events: Florian Wirtz scored an equalizer in the 118th minute
Mikel Merino scored a late winner in the 119th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Bayern Munich fans were on the fence regarding Joshua Kimmich’s extension or potential sale
Kai Havertz started as the striker despite being an inferior finisher compared to Niklas Füllkrug
Post-Match Reflections: Joshua Kimmich was praised as a masterclass on the right flank
Toni Kroos' last game as a footballer was memorable despite the loss
Julian Nagelsmann's lineup decisions were criticized, particularly starting Kai Havertz over Niklas Füllkrug
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game recorded the highest number of fouls in the tournament
Niklas Füllkrug and Jamal Musiala had clear chances that weren't converted
